column4: Does anyone know why is it impossible to download something with firefox to fat32? (really strange thing)
I know that this is stupid question, but how can I write "single quote" in ubuntu? I can only  double quotes - ". :(
sound like the wrong keyboard mapping?
keyboard shortcuts is not what I need
I was looking for an answer for you
for example I selected US English INternational kb. layout but I cant get it work - the single quotes
not sure may be one of the others might have an answer sorry
gatekeeper> okay, I know, but really thanks for trying to help me
nothing to thank me for I didn't manage to help you but would be interested if you find an answer
ok. can I ask you what keyboard layout have you on system > preferences > keyboard > layouots?
I selected English as I am in the UK
think it said English (British) during the installation
so united kingdom: international or dvorak?
